article_title: Steve Cochran Show 1.29.16: Live from Egg Harbor Cafe
article_text:
× Steve Cochran Show 1.29.16: Live from Egg Harbor Cafe

On today’s show we were live from Egg Harbor Cafe in Naperville! We featured Lou Manfredini’s first call, and White House Press Secretary Josh Earnest provided an update on Obamacare registration. Aaron Katersky from ABC News recapped the latest GOP Debate for us, and Adam Hoge offered his insight on who the Bears should be paying attention to for the upcoming NFL Draft. Dean Richards provided the latest in entertainment, and Andrea Darlas gave us another edition of the “Caucus Ruckus.” Today’s show also featured a conversation with Naperville Mayor Steve Chirico, plenty of shenanigans from John Da Cosse, and a whole lot more!

We featured Lou Manfredini’s first call, and White House Press Secretary Josh Earnest provided an update on Obamacare registration.
Dean Richards provided the latest in entertainment, and Andrea Darlas gave us another edition of the “Caucus Ruckus.” Today’s show also featured a conversation with Naperville Mayor Steve Chirico, plenty of shenanigans from John Da Cosse, and a whole lot more!
Aaron Katersky from ABC News recapped the latest GOP Debate for us, and Adam Hoge offered his insight on who the Bears should be paying attention to for the upcoming NFL Draft.
